properties.address: Cornerstone Church, Torpoint, Cornwall PL11 2AB
properties.description: Drop in session , open to everyone, providing a warm welcome and refreshments. A place to meet and chat about anything, closing with a short time of prayer. To welcome people who might be lonely or in need of a relaxed space to chat or just be. To provide a regular weekly time for socialising over tea, coffee squash and biscuits without need to pay. To welcome everyone and provide access to the worship space for private prayer. To join us in the coffee lounge for a time of prayer at the end if they choose.
properties.title: Cornerstone Church

properties.description: Main hall, disable access, light and warm! You are welcome to play board games or simply pop in for a warm welcome, chat and refreshments.
properties.title: Games Café - Warm Space

properties.address: Beacon Park Road, Devon, Devon PL2 3JR
properties.description: Open from 28/11/2022. All are welcome for a cuppa and chat. We are open all year round except on Bank Holiday Mondays.
properties.title: Holy Trinity Parish (Holy Family Church hall)

properties.address: Horrabridge Youth Club, Devon PL20 7TG
properties.description: Horrabridge Food Hub offers a warm and welcoming space with free hot drinks and snacks open to all.
properties.title: Horrabridge Food Hub

properties.address: Pennycross Methodist Church, Plymouth, Devon PL2 3PH
properties.description: We meet for a chat over a coffee and a biscuit and provide a warm welcome to anyone that wishes to join us. We are there to make new friends, catch up with old friends or simply provide a space where individuals can just sit quietly with a warm drink. Children are welcome to join us.
properties.title: Hug - A - Mug

properties.address: Plymouth Methodist Central Hall, Plymouth, Devon PL1 1BA
properties.description: The lunchtime Knit & Natter group, focused particularly on the older generation but open to all, will offer hot refreshments with cakes or biscuits, alongside activities like knitting, and conversation to combat isolation.
properties.title: Knit & Natter

properties.address: Pennycross Methodist Church, Plymouth, Devon PL2 3PH
properties.description: Hug-a-mug coffee morning. All are welcome. Toys available for younger ones, a cuppa and chat for everyone.
properties.title: Pennycross Methodist Church

properties.address: Saltash Baptist Church, Saltash, Cornwall PL12 4DR
properties.description: A warm and welcoming space with free biscuits, tea and coffee and wifi. Feel free to come and chat or just be. Term time only
properties.title: Saltash Baptist Church

properties.description: A Warm Welcoming space for all ages. Open every Monday - Saturday mornings for tea, coffee, and refreshments, 9:30 AM - 12 Noon. Hot lunches on Wednesdays and Thursdays, 12 Noon - 1:30 PM.

properties.description: Sherford Food Hub is open to all and offers free hot drinks and snacks. We can also provide hot soup and bread rolls. The food hub also offers members the opportunity to buy a bag of food for a £5 donation as well as free surplus food.
properties.title: Sherford Food Hub
